subject: debian.crosslink.net mirror removed from packages.d.o (was: about debian.crosslink.net)
body:
On Fri, Apr 20, 2007 at 01:02:27PM +0200, Tshepang Lekhonkhobe wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> The following link, linked from p.d.o shows empty results:
> http://debian.crosslink.net/

Thanks for reporting it, I've just fixed it.

The modification will be taken into account in the next days.
 

-- 
Simon Paillard


--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
